result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Scott J. Leitza

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Case called:  8:56 am
Clerk: Kim
14CF73, 14CF103 and 14CF404

State appears by ADA Lesli Pluster
Defendant appears in custody by Atty Wright Laufenberg
 
Date and time set for plea hearing.  VRCW. Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights. 

State moves to DRI 14CF73 (all counts), 14CF103 (count 2) and 14CF404 (counts 2 and 3).  Court grants.
  
PLEA: 14CF103 (count 1)  >> Guilty
14CF404 (count) >> Guilty

Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  

COURT ORDERS:   SWH 30 months probation ea. count concurrent>  Conditions:  14CF404 - 90 days jail, credit for 90 days served.  Both files - enroll and succesfully complete Safe Porgram, AODA, counseling as deemed approprioate, maintain FTE or FTS, or combination, or good faith effort, if not, 10 hours of community service, court costs, 2-DNA surcharges, and 14CF103 -- 5 days credit.  

Atty Laufenberg requests Notice of Assignment of Cash Bond.  COURT states Notice of Assignment of Cash Bond shall be followed.
Adjourned:  9:03 am
Financial Request Form
of Assignment of Cash Bond - includes 14CF73 & 14CF103 w/letter

of Assignment of Cash Bond w/ Agreement for Assignment of Cash Bond
INCLUDES 14CF73 & 14CF103 (filed in 14CF103)
Plea hearing on August 11, 2014 at 08:45 am.
to Judge Grau from Atty. Laufenberg - includes 14CF73, 14CF103, 14CF404
Pre-trial conference on June 25, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

records.descr: Application for specific judicial assign approved

records.addlTxt: of Judge (stj)
Information - signed

Clerk Marisa. 
Case Called: 8:37 am 
INCLUDES 14CF73, 14CF103, AND 14CF404.   
State appears by ADA Lesli Pluster; Deft appears in person with Atty Wright Laufenberg. 

WAIVER OF PRELIMINARY HEARING IN 14CF73 AND 14CF103. 
Waiver of Prelim. filed. 
Court questions deft as to waiver. 
Court finds waiver freely and voluntarily made. 
COURT finds PC - Defendant bound over for arraignment & trial. 
Informations filed. Reading Waived. 
Plea: Not Guilty on all.
COURT notes deft will have 10 days to file substitution of judge if he wishes to do so. 

INITIAL APPEARANCE IN 14CF404. 
Reading Waived. 
Argument to bond. 
COURT makes findings. 
COURT ORDERS $10,000 cash bond - CONDITIONS: No Contact with T.L. (NONWAIVABLE); No alcohol. 
COURT remands deft to the custody to the sheriff's dept until cash bond is posted. 
Preliminary Hearing set for 5/21/2014 at 9:15 am in Br. 1. 

DEFT'S MOTION FOR BOND MODIFICATION IN 14CF73 AND 14CF103. 
Atty Laufenberg requests portion of bond in 14CF103 be returned to allow deft to pay counsel. 
COURT denies motion. 

STATE'S MOTION FOR BOND FORFEITRUE IN 14CF73. 
COURT holds motion in abeyance for a later date.

to Forfeit Bond

Clerk Marisa.
Case Called: 11:52 am 
INCLUDES 14CF73 AND 14CF103. 
State appears by ADA Lesli Pluster; Deft does NOT appear - Atty Wright Laufenberg appears on his behalf. 
Date and Time was set for Motion Hearing regarding bond modification. 
COURT notes Atty Laufenberg has indicated miscommunication with his client regarding today's hearing. Atty Laufenberg requests to hold motion until preliminary hearing on 5/14/2014 at 8:30 am. No objection. COURT holds motion until preliminary hearing. 
State files motion to forfeit bond in 14CF73. 
Bond continues.

records.addlTxt: No contact with victim(s): T.L. Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.
